projects.title: Grass Shader
projects.bodyText: This project includes a dynamic grass shader created with Shader Graph and the Universal Render Pipeline (URP).

projects.title: Procedural Animation
projects.bodyText: This Unity project showcases procedural animations applied to a 3D spider model. The animations were crafted to generate realistic and dynamic movement without relying on pre-made animations, allowing for responsive and lifelike spider behavior in real time.

projects.title: Boundary Breaker
projects.bodyText: Boundary Breaker is a strategy game where the goal is to reveal all the squares on the board within 20 days. Players must construct buildings, manage resources, and plan each action strategically to explore the territory before time runs out.

projects.title: Rook And Roll
projects.bodyText: Rook and Roll is a 2D action game in Unity where you control a chess rook on a mission to escort the king to safety. Opposing pawns block your path, and itâ€™s up to you to eliminate them with swift movements. The faster you go, the greater your impact, allowing you to clear the way and protect the king.

projects.title: SquallWind
projects.bodyText: Squallwind is a 2.5D adventure game where you play as a squirrel preparing for storms by collecting acorns, seeking shelter, and burying them for the coming summer. I contributed to the project as a programmer, developing the mechanics of movement, endurance, and environmental interactions, as well as integrating the character's various animations.
